snippet.title: Battle Cross FEVER Trailer
snippet.description:
Download:

http://battlecrossfever.com


Join the Discord:
https://discord.gg/H4nVKdn

EMBRACE THE CHAOS!
Play up to 18 Players!  Full Controller support.

Prepare yourself for this brand new age of fighting game with never before seen mechanics!  Download the game and play with some friends.  Gamepads support included.  Check out our social media pages too.


All characters belong to their respective owners, SEGA, ARC System Works, TOEI, and NINTENDO.  This game is only for education and experimentation.
